Item ID1121

The mithril platebody is the third best smithable platebody, behind adamant. It has a requirement of 20 Defence to equip and provides greater defence than a mithril chainbody. Like all platebodies, however, it gives a crippling negative bonus to the user's Ranged and Magic stats. A player with 68 Smithing can make it by using five mithril bars on an anvil while carrying a hammer, granting 250 smithing experience.

Smithing a mithril platebody is a requirement for the Ardougne and Desert Achievement Diaries.
